query:
ALTER TABLE device_states 
  ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS lastPassedStopId VARCHAR(128) NULL,
  ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS lastPassedStopName VARCHAR(256) NULL,
  ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS lastPassedAt TIMESTAMP NULL,
  ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS earlyDepartureWarning BOOLEAN NOT NULL DEFAULT false;

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS quick_replies (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  content VARCHAR(256) NOT NULL,
  sortOrder INT NOT NULL DEFAULT 0,
  isActive BOOLEAN NOT NULL DEFAULT true,
  createdAt TIMESTAMP NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  updatedAt TIMESTAMP NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
);

ALTER TABLE device_states 
  ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS lastPassedStopId VARCHAR(128) NULL,
  ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS lastPassedStopName VARCHAR(256) NULL,
  ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS lastPassedAt TIMESTAMP NULL,
  ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS earlyDepartureWarning BOOLEAN NOT NULL DEFAULT false;

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS quick_replies (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  content VARCHAR(256) NOT NULL,
  sortOrder INT NOT NULL DEFAULT 0,
  isActive BOOLEAN NOT NULL DEFAULT true,
  createdAt TIMESTAMP NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  updatedAt TIMESTAMP NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
);
